languages.text: "Помните об этом, и не закрывайте глаза на мерзость, где б вы ее не встретили!"
"Remember this, and never turn a blind eye to wickedness, wherever you may encounter it!"
languages.original_text: "Помните об этом, и не закрывайте глаза на мерзость, где б вы ее не встретили!"

traits.locale_text: "Remember this, and never turn a blind eye to wickedness, no matter where you encounter it!"
"Remember this, and never turn a blind eye to wickedness, no matter where you encounter it!"
"Remember this, and never turn a blind eye to wickedness, wherever you may encounter it!"
"Remember this, and never turn a blind eye to wickedness, wherever you may encounter it!"
"Remember this, and never turn a blind eye to wickedness, wherever you may encounter it!"

languages.text: “要记住这一点。而且，无论在哪里遇到邪恶，都切不可对它视而不见！”
languages.original_text: "Remember this, and never turn a blind eye to wickedness, wherever you may encounter it!"

traits.locale_text: “要记住这一点。而且，无论在哪里遇到邪恶，都切不可对它视而不见！”

languages.text: «¡Recuérdalo y nunca hagas la vista gorda ante la maldad, independientemente de dónde la encuentres!».
languages.original_text: "Remember this, and never turn a blind eye to wickedness, wherever you may encounter it!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Recuérdalo y nunca hagas la vista gorda ante la maldad, independientemente de dónde la encuentres!».

languages.text: 「このことを忘れないように。また、どこで悪に出会おうと、決して見て見ぬふりをしてはなりません！」
languages.original_text: "Remember this, and never turn a blind eye to wickedness, wherever you may encounter it!"

traits.locale_text: 「このことを忘れないように。また、どこで悪に出会おうと、決して見て見ぬふりをしてはなりません！」

languages.text: "Vergesst das nicht, und wendet Euren Blick niemals vom Bösen ab, wo immer es Euch begegnet!"
languages.original_text: "Remember this, and never turn a blind eye to wickedness, wherever you may encounter it!"

traits.locale_text: "Vergesst das nicht, und wendet Euren Blick niemals vom Bösen ab, wo immer es Euch begegnet!"

languages.text: « Gardez bien cela en tête, et ne fermez jamais les yeux sur la méchanceté, où que vous la croisiez. »
languages.original_text: "Remember this, and never turn a blind eye to wickedness, wherever you may encounter it!"

traits.locale_text: « Gardez bien cela en tête, et ne fermez jamais les yeux sur la méchanceté, où que vous la croisiez. »

languages.text: "Bunu sakın unutmayın. Her nerede karşınıza çıkarsa çıksın kötülüğü asla görmezden gelmeyin!"
languages.original_text: "Remember this, and never turn a blind eye to wickedness, wherever you may encounter it!"

traits.locale_text: "Bunu unutmayın ve her nerede karşınıza çıkarsa çıksın, kötülükleri asla görmezden gelmeyin!"
